column1: Had a crush on a teacher?
Snuck out to go to an s/o's house?
Ruined a friend group because of a breakup?
Stayed over at a friends house becasue you were too drunk to come home?
Stayed over at a friends house becasue you were too high to come home?
Used an adult to get alcohol or weed?
Been friends with someone only because you felt bad for them?
Dated someone who you knew you didnt like from the start?
